thread.title: 'Be fearless, MS Dhoni. Go out and bat as if there is no tomorrow'
thread.title_full: 'Be fearless, MS Dhoni. Go out and bat as if there is no tomorrow' - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: 'Be fearless, MS Dhoni. Go out and bat as if there is no tomorrow'
text:
Mahendra Singh Dhoni's magic wand that snatched victories from hopeless situations unfortunately has stopped functioning. This resulted in the Twenty20 series defeat to South Africa before India lost the opening one-day international at Kanpur.
*MS Dhoni walks back after being dismissed for five during the second T20 against ... Â»
